title: Fountain of youth for heart health may lie in the gut

title_detail.value: Fountain of youth for heart health may lie in the gut

summary: As our collection of resident gut bacteria changes with age, it increasingly produces harmful metabolites that damage veins and blood vessels, driving disease, a new study suggests.

summary_detail.value: As our collection of resident gut bacteria changes with age, it increasingly produces harmful metabolites that damage veins and blood vessels, driving disease, a new study suggests.
